info.title: Fatafat Sewa API
info.description: API documentation for the Fatafat Sewa e-commerce application.

get.description: Get all shipping addresses for the authenticated user.

lat.description: Latitude coordinate (optional). Provided when address is selected from GPS/map.

lng.description: Longitude coordinate (optional). Provided when address is selected from GPS/map.

post.description: Create a new shipping address. The address can be created either from GPS/map selection (with lat/lng coordinates) or manual entry (without coordinates).

lat.description: Latitude coordinate (optional). Include when address is selected from GPS/map. Omit for manual address entry.

lng.description: Longitude coordinate (optional). Include when address is selected from GPS/map. Omit for manual address entry.

put.description: Update an existing shipping address. The address can be updated with GPS/map coordinates (lat/lng) or without them for manual entry.

lat.description: Latitude coordinate (optional). Include when address is selected from GPS/map. Omit for manual address entry.

lng.description: Longitude coordinate (optional). Include when address is selected from GPS/map. Omit for manual address entry.

get.description: Fetches detailed information about a single product.

data.name: OnePlus 15 (16GBRAM + 512GB Storage)
data.short_description: Flagship killer with Snapdragon 8 Elite and 165Hz Display.

post.description: Creates a new order with the selected products, shipping address, and payment method.

full_name.description: Full name of the person placing the order

shipping_address_id.description: ID of the saved shipping address

recipient.description: Recipient information based on recipient type (self, gift, or anonymous)

self_phone.description: Phone number if recipient_type is 'self'. Allows user to specify order-specific contact.

gift_recipient_name.description: Recipient name if this is a gift order

gift_recipient_phone.description: Recipient phone if this is a gift order

get.description: Retrieves a list of orders for the authenticated user.
Retrieves detailed information about a specific order.
